channel.title: C3.js on Ethan Nelson - Data Reporter
channel.description: Recent content in C3.js on Ethan Nelson - Data Reporter

item.title: Black coaches vanish from Big Ten basketball, once a model for diversity
item.description: In 2017, there were no nonwhite men’s basketball coaches in the Big Ten, the first time that had happened since the ‘80s. This is a story exploring the historical racial makeup in men’s college basketball. I did the analysis and made the graphics for this story by college basketball beat reporter Marcus Fuller. This story won an award from the National Association of Black Journalists.

item.title: University of Minnesota Student Election Turnout on the Rise
item.description: Voter turnout for the University of Minnesota’s student elections had been rising over the past few years in 2016. Using c3.js, I detailed this trend for both graduate students and undergraduates.
